title: And you thought you'd never use the 'ffl' ligature combination
content:
Because words like ‘waffle’ and ‘shuffle’ only rarely make headlines:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/snuffleupagus.jpg)
author: editor

comments.content: Ben Affleck doesn’t make many headlines these days either.
ran the \_ag\_ a little tight there didn’t they?
And there is that classic headline, ‘British Left Waffles on Falkland Islands’.
flying fish effectively affiliate in effluent fjords

Those poor fish are really in do-do :-)

ChrisL

_Is there an fj lig?_  
Yes. Sorry I didn’t respond sooner, was out boating on the fjord that JH mentioned.
